[\[6a.5\]]par sta gon la gnas pa'i rim pa'o//_//de nas gser ram dngul lam/_zangs las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa byas la/_de rnams ma 'byor na kham sa las bya'o/_/bum pa gzhan rnams kyang rin po che'i grangs ma rnyed na khams las bya'o/_/kun sa dkar gyis
[\[6a.6\]]byugs la/_pad+ma'i lte ba la phyag mtshan bkod la gzhag_/de nas bum pa rnams rang bzhin med par bsams la/_de las yi ge khaM dkar por gyur/_khaM dkar po 'od du zhu ba las byung ba'i bum pa nag po ra ri med pa dkar por 'dug pa/_mgrin pa ring ba lto che ba mchu 'phyang

[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chur nub pa'i sems can 'di dag la bdag he ru ka'i ngo bor gyur pas rdo rje theg pa'i chos bstan pa'i
[\[15b.2\]]gru rab tu byin pas yang dag pa'i gzung bas sgyu ma lta bu gnyis su med pa'i mchog tu dga' ba'i phung po'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid can la rab tu gzhag par bgyi zhes byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i bla ma sangs rgyas sgrub pa la 'di
[\[15b.3\]]las gnyis pa gzhan med pa'i thabs kyi mchog 'di la bdag gis brten par bgyi'o zhes bya'o/_/de nas sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar brtse ba'i mtshan nyid kyi byams pa chen po dang sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las gzung bar 'dod pa'i snying rje chen po dang /
[\[15b.4\]]sems can thams cad la dga' ba chen po 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dga' ba chen po dang /_brtags pa'i yul ma lus pa la btang snyoms pa'i mtshan nyid can btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas chos thams cad ni sems kyi rnam par brtags pa'o zhes yid
[\[15b.5\]]kyi dmigs pa de dang de'i rnam par rab tu snang ba 'di dag ni sems nyid 'khrul ba ste/_mya ngan la sogs pas rnam par 'khrul ba bzhin du sems las gzhan pa'i gzung ba 'di ni yod pa ma yin no/_/gzung ba med par 'dzin pa'i sems kyang yod pa ma yin no/_/de
[\[15b.6\]]lta bas na sna tshogs 'di dag sems kyi rang bzhin du rtogs par bya'o zhes don de nyid bstan par byas nas rdzas ma lus pa'i de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa'i sngags brjod par bya zhing tha mal pa'i rnam pa gzhig par bya ste/_oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM zhes bya'o/_/
[\[15b.7\]]de nas sngags kyi don mngon sum du byas la/_'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i rmi lam du nye bar dmigs pa bzhin du rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can sgyu ma lta bu'i ston ka'i nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i dkyil lta bur bltas la 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ma bdag med ma zhes bya'o/_/nga ni smon lam dang rjes su dran pa'i rgyu mthun par gyur pa'i rnam pa ltar/_bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dag pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rang bzhin bsgoms te/_mdun du sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil
[\[16a.2\]]'khor la yi ge hUM bsam par bya'o/_/de las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje kha dog nag po 'jigs su rung ba/_kha dog lnga pa rtse mo gsum pa'o/_/de'i dkyil du'ang nyi ma de la yi ge hUM dgod do/_/de la khro bo 'og mdung rtse/_/'jig dus me ltar bzod dka' ba/_/sdigs mdzub
[\[16a.3\]]g.yon gyi khu tshur snying /_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bsdigs par byed/_/rdo rje 'bar ba g.yas pa na/_/zhal ni hUM gis gang bar gyur/_/dpa' bo stag gi pags pa bsnams/_/phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan du byas/_/drag po chen po kha dog gnag_/'jigs pa shin tu 'jigs
[\[16a.4\]]pa ste/_/khrag 'dzag mgo yi phreng ba can/_/'jigs byed 'jigs rung spro bar byed/_/skra ni dmar ser gyen du 'greng /_/lce ni bsgyur zhing gar thabs can/_/spyan gsum dag dang yang dag ldan/_/mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa can/_/phyogs dang mtshams rnams kun du yang /_/
[\[16a.5\]]khro bo'i tshogs rnams spro bya zhing /_/rnal 'byor rig pas gsang sngags 'dis/_/rang gi mtshams nas phur bus gdab/_/oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA zhes ji snyed 'dod pa'i bar du'o/_/de'i nang du nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'od zer 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lce'i rtse mo ltar gcig tu gyur
[\[16a.6\]]nas phyogs mtshams su 'phros pas mtshams bcing ba dang /_rdo rje'i ra ba dang /_steng rdo rje'i gur dang 'og tu ni de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhir 'og rim bdun gyi bar du bsam par bya'o/_/de'i dbus su hUM yongs su gyur pa las/_chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi
[\[16a.7\]]gzugs ston ka'i ri bong can gyi rnam pa lta bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo mtshar chen po'i 'od zer gyi tshogs mngon par 'byung ba'i 'og phra ba steng yangs pa zur gsum pa'i nang stong pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma sna tshogs dang sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje'o/_/
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]de'i lte ba la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor bzhi'i ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa puk+ka sI la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin gong nas gong du blta bar bya'o/_/de la dang por ni yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa lta bu sngon po rtse mo gnyis su g.yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan
[\[16b.2\]]pa'o/_/raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa rtse mo phra ba dmar po 'od kyi phreng ba dmar pos mtshan pa'o/_/de'i steng du baM las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pa'o/_/de'i steng du laM las byung ba sa'i dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa kha dog ser po
[\[16b.3\]]zur rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o/_/de'i steng du rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu nyid du brtags pa'o/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la 'byung chen bzhi yongs su gyur pa las mdor bsdus nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
[\[16b.4\]]rnam par dag pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gzhal yas khang dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu ma lta bur ston pa'i dur khrod kyis yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya ste/_zur bzhi pa ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar
[\[16b.5\]]mdzes pa sgo khyud bzhis mdzes par byas pa/_rta babs bzhis brgyan pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /_me long dang me tog gi phreng ba dang /_bla re dang /_rnga yab kyis spras pa/_rdo rje thig gis brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi tshogs 'phros pas mdzes pa/_g.yo ba'i ba dan yid
[\[16b.6\]]du 'ong ba'i rtse mo'i phyogs kyi sgo rnams las dril bu'i sgra sgrogs pa/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par bkod pas nyams su dga' ba'o/_/de'i dkyil du sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin phyogs mtshams pad+ma ni/_/rang rang stan gyi ge sar
[\[16b.7\]]la/_/tshangs dbang nye dbang drag po dang /_/de bzhin gshin rje gnod sbyin dang /_/bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris/_/rgyas par gau rI la sogs kyi'o/_/lho dang nub dang byang dag dang /_/dbus su bdud ni bzhi po dag_/dbyibs dang kha dog ji lta bu/_/de lta'i gzugs
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]su dgod par bya/_/bdud rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/_/snying la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/bgegs rnams bred pa de dang de/_/skyabs tshol ba la gcig pu 'bad/_/de la dbus kyi 'dab ma la ni lugs su 'byung ba dang /_lugs las bzlog pa'i a la
[\[17a.2\]]sogs pa dbyangs kyi yi ge nyis 'gyur du byas pa/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon par byed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/_/de'i steng du yi ge k+Sha bor ba'i ka la sogs pa'i yi ge d+ha da b+ha ya ra la wa dang bcas pa'i lugs su 'byung ba
[\[17a.3\]]dang /_lugs las bzlog pa nyis 'gyur du byung ba de dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mtshon par byed pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/_/de'i dkyil du sa bon gyi yi ge hUM aM ngo /_/de dag yongs su gyur pa las rang gi stan la gnas pa'i sa bon gnyis
[\[17a.4\]]kyi snying po las sna tshogs rdo rje dang /_gri gug dang /_thod pa la gnas pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsam par bya'o/_/de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i thub pa mchog gi tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa la rnam par gzigs
[\[17a.5\]]pas de dag tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su byas nas/_slar log nas gcig tu gyur par byas pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/_/de nas nyi ma dang zla ba dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon las yongs su gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das
[\[17a.6\]]rdo rje 'chang chen po ni dpe med pa'i tshogs kyi rdul phra rab las yongs su bsgrubs pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag dang zhal dang mdog dang dbyibs kyis mtshon pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o/_/de lta bu'i bdag med ma ni sku la 'khyud pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag
[\[17a.7\]]pa'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o/_/de lta bu'i mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'o/_/de'i thugs ka nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa he ru ka'i gzugs su rdzogs par byas nas spyan drangs nas bcug pa zhu bar gyur pa las gaM la
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]sogs pa'i sa bon brgyad las byung ba'i gau rI la sogs mkha' 'gro ma spro zhing dran par bya'o/_/de nas nam mkha' la dri za'i sems can phra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs can kha dog dmar po ho dmar po'i phreng ba gnyis kyis yongs su bskor bar bltas la/_snying gar 'od kyis
[\[17b.2\]]spyan drangs shing bcug nas bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje can rang gi rig pa dang bcas pa 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pas ston ka'i zla ba dri ma med pa lta bur zhu bar gyur nas bde ba chen po'i mthar gnas par bya'o/_/de nas
[\[17b.3\]]puk+ka sI la sogs pa lha mo bzhi shin tu 'dod pa'i tshul gyis 'ongs nas rang rang gi phyogs su 'dug ste/_thugs sad par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glus bcom ldan 'das slong bar byed pa/_bzhengs shig dang sgrol thugs rje'i thugs/_/puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/_/stong pa'i rang bzhin
[\[17b.4\]]nyid spongs la/_/bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod/_/khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas/_/dgyes pa'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig_/stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/_/ri khrod ma 'bras 'grub par mdzod/_/bdag gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas/_/stong pa nyid
[\[17b.5\]]la bzhugs sam ci/_/khyod med phyogs ni ma 'tshal bas/_/tsaN+Da lI bdag gsol ba 'debs/_/bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis/_/mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig_/DoM bi mo bdag sgren mo lags/_/thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig_/ces pa'o/_/
[\[17b.6\]]de nas glu'i ngo bor rmi lam sad pa bzhin du zla ba zhu ba de bsdus pa las byung ba'i sa bon gnyis so/_/de dag yongs su gyur pa las phyag mtshan gnyis so/_/de'i dkyil du nyi ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon de gnyis nyid de/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin
[\[17b.7\]]blta bar bya'o/_/de las mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam pa can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par spro zhing yang dag par bsdus pa'i sbyor bas de dag thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu'i sems kyi rang bzhin gnyug ma la ltos par dpag par bya zhing /_zla ba dang nyi ma phyag mtshan
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i he ru ka'i gzugs bdag med ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/_/zhabs rnams sa la brten mdzad cing /_/lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad/_/mig ni dmar zhing zlum la 'gyur/_/
[\[18a.2\]]khros shing sgeg pa ral ba can/_/zhabs ni bzhi dang zhal brgyad dang /_/phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan/_/phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag lha'i/_/bu yi bdud bzhi mnyam par gnon/_/skyil krung phyed pa'i gar thabs can/_/khrag 'dzag mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng /_/shin tu
[\[18a.3\]]'jigs rung nyam ngar gnas/_/spyi gtsug sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin/_/'jig dus me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/_/zhal nas hUM ni sgrogs mdzad cing /_/sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis bsgos/_/'jig dus sbyin dang dbang sngon 'dra'i/_/rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku lus can/_/ri bong can 'dra'i 'od dang ni/_/
[\[18a.4\]]nyin mo byed pa'i 'od 'dra ba'i/_/g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal mdog go/_/steng ma'i zhal ni dud mdog 'dra/_/rnam par 'gyur dang bung ba 'dra/_/lhag ma'i zhal ni bzhi pa'o/_/zhal kun kyang mche ba gtsigs pa spyan gsum gyis mdzes pa/_/dpral ba'i steng du thod pa'i du ma bu lngas
[\[18a.5\]]brgyan pa/_smin ma g.yo ba/_skra dmar ser gyen du 'greng ba/_gcer bu gar dgu dang ldan pa/_/phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang /_/lag pa gang du bu ska rags so/_/glo dang dbugs rgod de bzhin skyo/_/za byed mdze dang za g.ya' dang /_/dmu chu spri ha'i
[\[18a.6\]]rang bzhin nyid/_/glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/_/de bzhin mi dang seng byi la/_/g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po ru/_/gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/zla ba dang ni nyi ma dang /_/mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin rnams/_/g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/_/lha mo
[\[18a.7\]]bdag med ma de ni/_/phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/bdud bzhi'i khrag gis bkang ba yi/_/thod pa yis ni phyag g.yon brel/_/g.yas na nyon mongs gcod pa yi/_/gri gug bsnams par mdzad pa yin/_/gcer bu kha dog nag mo ste/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]nas 'khyud/_/spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas gnas/_/phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/dpral ba'i steng du mgo skam phreng /_/mdzes pa dag gis mdzes par byas/_/khrag med mgo yi phreng ba yis/_/grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma
[\[18b.2\]]la brgyan/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma la ni hUM ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs ka'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba la yi ge aM blta bar bya ste/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid lam tsho skyes dang /_
[\[18b.3\]]srog song ba'i snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a A i I uM gi sa bon las skyes pas mtshan ma'i gri gug dang /_zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyor du byas pa yongs su gyur pa las/_rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo/_nag mo/_ser mo/_/dmar mo/_/ljang gu
[\[18b.4\]]ni gti mug dang /_zhe sdang dang /_phra ma dang /_'dod chags dang /_phrag dog ni bdag med ma mkha' 'gro ma'i rang bzhin te/_gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'i dkyil 'khor phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o/_/rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma lnga po 'di dag ni
[\[18b.5\]]rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung por bsam par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gti mug dang /_zhe sdang dang /_nga rgyal dang /_phra ma dang /_'dod chags dang /_phrag dog dang /_gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la
[\[18b.6\]]ni/_gau rI dang /_tso rI dang /_be tA lI dang /_g+hasma rI dang /_sa spyod ma dang /_mkha' spyod ma dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang nam mkha' la ni/_puk+ka sI dang /_sa pa rI dang /_tsaN+DalI dang /_DoM bi nI'o/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid la ni sdig song ba'i snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
[\[18b.7\]]steng du oM AM gi sa bon las skyes pa'i/_dkar mo dang /_dmar mo dang /_nag mo dang /_sa spyod ma dang /_mkha' spyod ma dang /_bdag med ma'i rnal 'byor ma rnams rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pas gnas nas su'o/_/sha ni puk+ka sI ru grags/_/khrag ni
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]sa ba rI ru brtags/_/tsaN+Da lI ni khu bar bstan/_/DoM bi rkang tshil dag pa ste/_/'di dag lha yi rnam dag go/_/da ni rnam par dag pa gzhan dag brjod par bya ste/_pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun/_/rus pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/_/thugs
[\[19a.2\]]rje'i spyan ni dmar po ste/_/byams pa'i thugs kyis yan lag nag/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag gis/_/zhabs bzhi dag tu dran par bya/_/zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa ste/_/phyag ni stong pa bcu drug go/_/tshad ni sangs rgyas lnga yin te/_/khro ba gdug pa 'dul ba po/_/spyan ni rnam
[\[19a.3\]]dag rdo rje gsum/_/brten pa'i sems kyis dngos grub 'gyur/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad cu drug_/'dab ma sum cu gnyis pad+ma/_/sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang /_/bde chen zhes bya go rims bzhin/_/lte ba snying ga mgrin pa mgor/_/'khor lo bzhi po bsgom par bya/_/'od zer lnga
[\[19a.4\]]po dkar dang nag_/dmar dang sngo ba de bzhin te/_/oM hUM aM haM ci rigs par/_/steng dang 'og tu kha bltas nas/_/shes rab thabs kyi rnam dag gis/_/gnyis gnyis dag tu nye bar bstan/_/de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gnyug ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis gdod ma nas grub pa'i khams
[\[19a.5\]]gsum na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchog gi tshogs spyan drangs pa nam mkhar bzhugs su gsol te/_phyi dang nang dang gsang ba mchod pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag par mchod la/_oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa dang /_he ru ka'i gzugs su gyur pa'i de
[\[19a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin bum pa lnga lag pa'i pad+mas gzung bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/dbang bskur ma thag tu spyi bor thugs kyi bdag por gzhag go/_/me tog gi char dang gur gum gyi char yang 'bab par 'gyur
[\[19a.7\]]ro/_/rnga'i sgra yang sgrogs par byed do/_/gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas kyang mchod par byed do/_/sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pas kyang stod par byed do/_/de'i rjes la rang rig pa thugs kar gnas pas dbang bskur bas mig la sogs pa 'thob par bsgoms la/_tshogs lhag par
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]bya ba'i don du rigs lngas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de'i rim pa 'di yin te/_mgo dang /_snying ga dang /_lte ba dang /_gsang ba dang /_brla rnams su/_oM hUM swa AHhA'i sa bon lnga las rdzogs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_snang ba
[\[19b.2\]]mtha' yas dang /_don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa'i sku can bsgom par bya'o/_/hUM dang a'i sa bon las nges par byung ba'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ze ba la hUM dang oM las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i rdo rje'i nor bu ji ltar rigs par sngags gnyis kyis byin gyis
[\[19b.3\]]brlabs te/_oM pad+ma su kha d+ha ra ma hA rA rA ga su kha d+ha ra/_tsa tur A nan+da b+ha ga bi shA hUM hUM hUM ka R+YaM ku ru Sh+wa me/_tsa tur A nan+da da ya ka kha ga mu khe ka rA so nA tha hUM hUM hUM/_kar+yaM ku ru Sh+wa me zhes bya ba de dang lhan cig tu dga' ba brtsam par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang po'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i
[\[19b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de'i rjes la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi lcags kyus he ru ka'i 'khor lo spyan drangs nas bdag nyid la bcug la zhu bar byas nas/_zla ba zhu ba lta bur gyur pa pad+ma'i nang du ltung ba las bskyed pa'o/_/rang gi sa bon dang phyag mtshan las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
[\[19b.5\]]gyi dbang phyug dang /_gau rI la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs bskyed cing /_hUM aM gaM tsaM baM g+haM paM shaM laM DaM zhes bya ba'i 'byin pa'i sngags kyis sprul cing gdon no/_/de la bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ji skad bstan pa'i phyag dang zhal sku mdog la sogs
[\[19b.6\]]pas mtshon pa rang gi bdag nyid gzhug go/_/gau rI kha dog nag mo ste/_/g.yas dang gzhan la gri gug dang /_/ro hi ta yi nya bsnams la/_/shar sgor nyi ma'i gdan la bsam par bya'o/_/de bzhin du tsau rI ni btsod kyi mdog lta bu rnge'u chung dang phag pa bsnams pa lho'i gdan

[\[33b.1\]]khyab 'jug drag_/gzhon nu tshogs bdag dag byed dang /_/legs ldan nag po rim par gnas/_/dkar ser dmar dang nam mkha'i mdog_/dkar gnyis ser dang nag po ste/_/mdog kyang de bzhin rim par gsal/_/rdo rje dbyu gu rtse gsum dang /_/'khor lo rtse gsum

[\[34a.3\]]dkyil 'khor gsum/_/zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar/_/dbus ni sku dang mthun pa nyid/_/rdo rje ral gri g.yas na 'dzin/_/dril bu rtse gsum phyag g.yon na/_/rang ni rang rig yum la 'khyud/_/phyag bzhi rdo rje thod pa dag_/g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag na 'dzin/_/

[\[34b.1\]]btang snyoms sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes/_/'khor lo'i gzugs ni mi bskyod pa/_/rna cha dag la 'od dpag med/_/mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso/_/yan lag kun bkod rnam snang mdzad/_/'od dpag la ni don yod grub/_/yan lag kun thugs rdo rje 'dzin/_/zhal brgyad

[\[35a.1\]]rang gi yi dam lha'i 'dab 'byams bzlas/_dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i 'dab 'bum bzlas lha dang lha mo gzhan gyi 'dzab khri bzlas/_de yang tshul ji ltar bzlas she na/_dkyil 'khor gar byed pa'i sar maN+Dal gru bzhi pa khru gang ba byas la/_de la ba'i rnam

[\[35a.5\]]gsol lo/_/dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/_/de ni dang po'i bsnyen pa'o//_//sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/de la yang brgyad de/_sa btsal zhing brtag pa dang /_sa bslang ba dang /_sa brtan par gzung ba dang /_sa sbyang ba dang /_sa byin gyis brlab pa dang /_

[\[35a.7\]]pa nyes pa med pa/_shar dang byang du gzhol ba/_me tog dang shing dang chu dang ldan par bya'o/_/yang na yid du 'ong bar bya'o/_/de ni btsal zhing brtag pa'o/_/sa bslang ba ni slob dpon dgyes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pas/_ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal khru gang

[\[35b.3\]]du mtshan ma ston cig ces brjod pas/_gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs la/_bzlas pa byed cing seng ge'i nyal thabs kyis nyal bar bya'o/_/rmi lam na nged rnams la mi gnod kyis gyis shig zer na de nyid du bya'o/_/sa brtan par gzung ba ni/_sa khung na phyi de zhag gi snga dro dang po la
[\[35b.4\]]sngar gyi maN+Dal la zhal bshal la/_de ru dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dmigs la/_phyi nang gi mchod pa bya ste/_phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma byin la 'di skad brjod do/_/sa 'di tsam zhig khugs na dgyes pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor byed kyis/_khyed rnams
[\[35b.5\]]sems mi nur zhing bgegs med pa dang /_grogs kyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phyogs thams cad nas/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs/_/byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dag/_bdag dang che ge mo zhig gi/_don du brtan par bzhugs nas ni//
[\[35b.6\]]mngon shes can gyi mchod yon bzhes/_/zhes lan gsum brjod de gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/kye bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang /_byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol zhes brjod do/_/gal te dga' ba'i sa gzhi rmi lam du ma khugs
[\[35b.7\]]na/_khro bo'i nga rgyal byas la mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg byas te bgegs bskrad pas snga ma bzhin du bya'o/_/de ni sa gzhi brtan par gzung ba'o/_/sa sbyang ba ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tshul bzhin byas la/_me lha'i thugs kar sa'i lho mo bsams la/_de la mchod pa dang sbyin sreg

[\[36a.1\]]byas la/oM AHhUM muHzhes brjod pas nam mkha' la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ji tsam 'dod pa'i gnas gru bzhir dmigs la klu'i bdag po bsams te/_brko bar bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po ni ston zla gsum la glo g.yon pa sa la
[\[36a.2\]]phab ste mgo shar du bstan nas kha lhor bltas te nyal lo/_/dgun zla gsum la mgo lhor bstan kha nub tu bltas nas nyal lo/_/dpyid zla gsum la mgo nub tu bstan kha byang du bltas nas nyal/_dbyar zla gsum la mgo byang du bstan kha shar du bltas te nyal lo/_/sa rko
[\[36a.3\]]thabs ni/_klu'i mgo bo dang /_rgyab dang /_phang por nas brko bar bya'o/_/mngon par dga' ba'i dngos grub kyi don du/_brang gi phyogs su lkog ma dang lte ba dang pus mo tsam gyi bar dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum 'dod pa'i don du g.yas g.yon na bzhugs par bsam zhing brko
[\[36a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/sa phyung la rdo ba dang gseg ma dang /_mgal du ma dang /_sol ba dang /_rus pa dang /_gyo mo dang /_bong ba la sogs pa med par byas nas/_sa gzhan snum pa bzang po dang dri zhim bsres te blugs par bya'o/_/de nas dri zhim po dang chu bsres pa la yi ge hUM
[\[36a.5\]]zlos shing bkang la 'thas par bcag ste/_lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'i steng du/_gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi dang rgyan la sogs pa dang ldan par bsam mo/_/de nas spos dang bdud rtsi lnga'i chu la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas la gtor bar bya'o/_/sman dang 'bru dang rin po che
[\[36a.6\]]la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas la gzhug par bya'o/_/sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa ni/dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug la/_dgyes pa rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bya ste/khaM las sa gzhi nam mkha' ltar bsgom/_suM las ri rab ser po gru bzhi pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par
[\[36a.7\]]bsgom/_laM las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzhis gru bzhir mtshan pa ser por bsgom/_hUM las sa gzhi rdo rjer bsgom/_/de nas me di nI badzrI b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha hUM zhes brjod pas sa gzhi 'od can du byin gyis brlab po/_/de ni sa gzhi byin gyis

[\[36b.1\]]brlab pa'o/_/bgegs bskrad pa ni/_hrIH gsum brjod la slob dpon phyir byung ste/_dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'dug la/_bdag gi snying gnas byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo las sprul pa byung bas nam mkha' khyab par bsams te/_phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang
[\[36b.2\]]bcas pa khyed rnams kyis/_bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod cing snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje'i dbus su bcug la bdag dang gcig tu gyur bar bsams te/_rang gi lus dgyes pa rdo rje'i nga rgyal
[\[36b.3\]]bya ste/_hUM brjod cing sems dpa'i skyil krung phyed pa la gnas nas/_mig g.yon par Ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_'bras bu gnyis las hUM shin tu g.yo ba bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba las rdo rje'i mig bya'o/_/
[\[36b.4\]]de nas g.yas par rdo rje gsor zhing /_g.yon par dril bu dkrol zhing dkur bzung la/_mgo dang mig g.yon du cung zad btud de/_rkang mthil gnyis su hUM las rdo rje rgya gram du bsams la/_byang shar du gnas te 'di skad brjod do/_/nyon cig bgegs tshogs thams cad kyi/_/
[\[36b.5\]]sku gsung thugs la gnas pa rnams/_/dpal sogs dgyes rdor dag gis ni/_/srung ba'i 'khor lo byed pa'o/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/_/gal te gang gis dam tshig 'das/_/'dod gsum bskyed bya gsad bya ste/_/tshal bar 'gas pa gdon mi za/_/zhes
[\[36b.6\]]brjod la g.yas brkyang dang /_g.yon brkyang la sogs pa'i stang stabs kyis dkyil 'khor la lan gsum du hUM brjod cing bskor bar bya'o/_/de ni bgegs bskrad pa'i rim pa'o/_/phur pa gdab pa ni/_lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa dri dang bdud rtsi'i chus gtor te mdun du bzhag
[\[36b.7\]]la stong par bsgom/_stong pa'i ngang las hUM ljang na gcig tu gyur par bsam/_de las bdud rtsi 'khyil ba zhal gsum phyag drug pa cig tu lte ba yan chad bsgom mo/_/smad phur pa zur gsum 'od 'bar ba cig bsam mo/_/de nas dbang ldan nas brtsams te bskor
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]phyogs su/oM he badzra big+h+nAn uts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT/_ces bya ba'i sngags kyis phur bu la bzlas shing phyogs bcur btab la/_'og gser gyis gzhi la thug pa'i bar du dbab par bsam mo/_/de ni phur bu gdab ba'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i
[\[37a.2\]]rdo rje slob dpon la/_gau rI la sogs pa'i ting 'dzin can gyi lha mo bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mchod cing gsol ba gdab pa ni/_dkyil 'khor bri phyir shar phyogs nas gau rI'i rnal 'byor pas dbus su gtso bo la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul nas 'di skad brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[37a.3\]]kun zhi ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/zhes bskul lo/_/lho phyogs nas tsau rI'i rnal 'byor pas dbus kyi gtso bo la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul nas 'di skad ces brjod do/_/mtshan
[\[37a.4\]]nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/_/mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs/_/kun du bzang po sku yi mchog_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/_/zhes bskul lo/_/nub phyogs nas pra mo hA'i rnal 'byor pas/_dbus kyi gtso bo la mchod pa rnam lnga phul nas 'di

[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste/_thugs kar bcug ste 'od du zhu nas rdo rje'i lam du phyung ste/_yum gyi pad+ma'i gnas su phab la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du phyogs bcur spros nas sems can gyi don ma lus par bya ste/_blo dang

[\[77b.1\]]cad sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed nas/_chos kyi dbyings rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_sems kyis rtse gcig tu bya'o/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sreg rdzas so so'i 'bras bu

[\[80a.1\]]dang ldan pa dang /_dril bu'i sgra sgrog cing dbab par bya'o/_/oM A be sha ya/_stam+b+ha yar ra tsa la ya tsa la ya hUM ha a dz+haiH/_sngags 'dis bskul nas ji snyed ma phebs kyi bar du dbab par bya'o/_/yang na slob ma'i rkang pa'i 'og tu gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor

[\[80b.1\]]'grub/_/sku yi stod du babs pa ni/_/de yi dngos grub mchog tu bshad/_/gang zhig sku smad me tog bab/_/dngos grub 'bring zhes thub pas gsungs/_/mchog gi sangs rgyas thob pa yin/_/'bring gis dbang phyug la sogs dang /_/yang na gter gyi dngos grub 'grub/_/

[\[81b.4\]]dbang bskur ro/_/rdo rje khu tshur gyis bum pa gzung ste/_dbang bskur ba/_oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod la 'khor los sgyur par dbang bskur ro/_/rim pa 'di ltar rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o/_/gnyis pas ni gau rI la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi bum pas dbang bskur bar bya
[\[81b.5\]]ste/_me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni chu'i dbang ngo /_/de la slob ma rin po che rgyal por dmigs te/_de'i spyi bor gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan gyis de'i rigs kyi lhar dmigs nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/gong gi sngags dang tshig gis dbang bskur zhing phyogs bcu'i
[\[81b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug nas dbu rgyan la bstim mo/_/'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin de dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo /_/de nas slob ma snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzugs su dmigs te/_rdo rje rtse lnga pa la snang ba mtha' yas bskyed la/_sangs rgyas

[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]bskur ro/_/des so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje'i dbang ngo /_/de nas slob ma don yod grub pa'i gzugs su dmigs la dril bu don yod grub par bskyed de/_lag pa g.yon par byin pa dang /_rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa'i lag pas kun nas 'khyud de/_

[\[82a.3\]]la/_rdo rje dang dril bu spyi bor gzung ste/_oM badzra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra nA ma/_a b+hi She ka ta zhes brjod nas dbang bskur te/_kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ming gi dbang bskur bas/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ming 'di zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur ro/_/de
[\[82a.4\]]ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi dbang ngo /_/dbang de dag gis sngags dang rgyud nyan pa dang /_bsgrub par bya ba'i cho ga thams cad gnang ba dang /_sgrub thabs la sogs pa thams cad bshad par gnang ngo /_/de dag gis ni sgrub pa po'i dbang ste/_rig pa'i
[\[82a.5\]]dbang lnga'o/_/rig pa ni ma rig pa spangs shing ye shes lnga thob pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo /_/gang dang gang dag snang ba ni/_/rang bzhin gtso bo he ru ka/_/chos ni so sor dag pa ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes de ltar blta/_/rig dbang thun mong byang chub ste/_/yang dag rdzogs
[\[82a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/khyad par byang chub thob mi 'gyur/_/de la ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod pas slob dpon gyi dbang blang bar bya ste/_thun mong gi sdom pa dang ldan pas/_khyad par gyi slob dpon gyi sdom pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje brtul

[\[82b.1\]]kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba tsam sbyin zhing rjes su gnang ba ni ma yin no zhes slob dpon kha cig gis de ltar gsung /_gzhan yang slob dpon kha cig gis ni mos pa gtso bor byas te rjes su gnang ba yang sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir zhes bya ba

[\[82b.3\]]gis ni/_/bu khyod yang dag gzhug par bya/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pa'i tshogs/_/khyed la rjes su gnang ba sbyin/_/de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod/_/bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang gi thugs/_/rig pa 'di ni bdag gis gzung /_/zhes brjod pa dang /_rjes su gnang ba'i sngags la
[\[82b.4\]]bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/_slob dpon gyis slob ma la bsgo ba/_sngags dang phyag rgya dang ye shes dang bdag gi de kho na nyid mi shes pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid mi shes pa dang /_dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la ston par ma byed cig_/khyod dang gang la bstan pa de nyid chags
[\[82b.5\]]sdang gis zhugs shing bstan pa yin pas na dmyal bar nges par ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes slob ma la bsgo bar bya'o/_/rig pa'i dbang gi yan lag gi cho ga'o//_//de nas slob mas rig pa'i dbang thob pa dang slob dpon gyi sdom pa bzung nas/_bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal
[\[82b.6\]]nas yon gyi mchog phul te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/_/mchod rten ji ltar gsol ba ltar/_/bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol/_/zhes gsol ba lan gsum du btab nas/dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ba ni
[\[82b.7\]]dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar sgor pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris pa'i steng du khyad par gyi khri bshams nas/_der slob ma bzhag la/_bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer nam mkha'i khams su spros te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad he ru ka'i skur
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]bsgoms te/_mchod pa'i khyad par rnams dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sgra sna tshogs dang /_bkra shis kyi glu sna tshogs brjod pa dang ldan pas spyan drangs te/_de dag gis rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs nas

[\[83a.4\]]'dzin yongs su gzung ba dang /_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor ro/_/sems kyi snang ba rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir gzhal yas khang ngo /_/sems mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir gru bzhi'o/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba
[\[83a.5\]]dang /_btang snyoms kyi rnam par dag pas thig bzhi'o/_/chos rjes su dran pas thig go/_/bden pa'i sku log par lta ba dang /_dman pa'i log par lta ba dang /_tshul khrims la 'jug pa log par lta ba dang /_yang dag pa las log par lta ba spangs pa'i phyir/_

[\[83a.7\]]chos skyes pa spong ba ni shar phyogs kyi rta babs so/_/mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa mi skyed pa ni lho phyogs kyi rta babs so/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa skyed pa ni nub phyogs kyi rta babs so/_/dge ba'i chos skyes pa bsrung ba ni byang phyogs kyi rta babs so/_/lus dang /_tshor ba
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]dang sems dang chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rnam par dag pa ni 'dod yon gyi snam bu'o/_/bzod pa dang chos dang don dang sngags yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam par dag pas ni/_lha rnams la gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs glu ma dang gar ma'o/_/stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa ni shar gyi sgo'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni lho'i
[\[83b.2\]]sgo'o/_/smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni nub kyi sgo'o/_/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni byang gi sgo'o/_/spyod pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni shar phyogs kyi rin po che'i ka tan gnyis so/_/brtson 'grus

[\[83b.5\]]spangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yongs su rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam gyi ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ni rlung yab po/_/nyon mongs pa'i sa bon bcom pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa dang bral te dra ba'o/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcom zhing bral ba ste dra ba
[\[83b.6\]]phyed pa'o/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ni me long ngo /_/'gro ba thams cad chos kyi ngo bor dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir dang /_'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir pad+ma'o/_/sems can thams cad las 'byung ba'i so so yang dag par mi skye ba'i byang chub

[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]snam bu'o/_/chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir mchod pa'i khyad par ro/_/bag yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa'i phyir/sna tshogs pa'i ral gris brgyan pa'o/_/'dul bas khyad par du byas pa'i chos dang mdo'i sde dang dbyangs
[\[84a.2\]]su bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_de ltar gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa ni rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan
[\[84a.3\]]la dril bu'i sgra sgrog pa'o/_/sha'i spyan dang /_lha'i spyan dang /_shes rab kyi spyan dang /_chos kyi spyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi rnam par dag pa ni pany+tsa re khA'o/_/de ltar bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyang shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang khyad par 'di yod
[\[84a.4\]]de/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag

[\[84a.7\]]rnam par dag pa ni ro langs ma'o/_/ro'i skye mched dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin so so'i rnam par dag pa ni g+hasma rI'o/_/sa'i khams dang sku'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rnam pa dag pa ni puk+ka sI'o/_/chu'i khams dang gsung gi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ni sha pa rI'o/_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]me'i khams dang thugs kyi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ni tsaN+DalI'o/_/rlung gi khams dang de kho na nyid kyi ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa ni DoM bi nI'o/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu dang /_rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
[\[84b.2\]]bdag nyid dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o/_/bdag med pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni reg pa'i skye mched dang /_shes rab ye shes kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin ni sa spyod ma'o/_/chos kyi skye mched dang dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi stobs kyi rang
[\[84b.3\]]bzhin gyi rnam par dag pa ni mkha' spyod ma'o/_/dad pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin ni gau rI'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin ni tsau rI'o/_/dran pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin ni be tA lI'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'i rang bzhin ni g+hasma rI'o/_/rab tu dga' ba dang dri ma med par dang 'od
[\[84b.4\]]byed pa'i rang bzhin ni puk+ka sI'o/_/'od 'phro ba dang /_sbyang dka' ba dang /_mngon du gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni sha ba rI'o/_/ring du song ba dang mi g.yo ba'i rang bzhin ni tsaN+DalI'o/_/legs pa'i blo gros dang chos kyi sprin gyi rang bzhin ni DaM bi nI'o/_/gzugs kyi phung po dang mig gi skye
[\[84b.5\]]mched dang gti mug chen po rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje ma'o/_/tshor ba'i phung po dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_nga rgyal chen po dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni gsang ba'i gau rI ma'o/_/'du shes kyi
[\[84b.6\]]phung po dang lce'i dbang po dang /_'dod chags chen po rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni chu'i rnal 'byor ma'o/_/'du byed kyi phung po dang lus kyi skye mched dang phrag dog chen po dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang
[\[84b.7\]]bzhin ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang /_yid kyi skye mched dang zhe sdang chen po dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni bdag med ma'o/_/de dag ni lha'i de kho na nyid do/_/phyi dang nang gi sa yongs su sbyang ba la sogs pa ni
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]slob dpon gyi las dang bya ba'o/_/de nas dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa ni rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi snod du rung ba yin te/_rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/_sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi/_/ye shes lnga ldan rdo rje ni/_/khyod la yang dag sbyin par bya/_/hUM gis thugs

[\[85a.5\]]dga' ba che/_/kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/_/rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag_/khyod kyis rtag tu 'chang bar gyis/_/'di dag brjod nas slob ma'i lag tu sbyin par bya'o/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya e Sha twaM d+hA ra ya mi/_hi hi hi hi hUM/_'dis rdo rje 'dzin du

[\[85a.7\]]dngos med byas/_/rang bzhin dag la sems pa rnams/_/dam pa srid pa byed par shog_/de dag gis ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin te/_dril bu'i de kho na nyid 'dzin du bcug la dkrol bar bya'o/_/de nas lhag pa'i lha'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la/_gzugs
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]sogs sku yi dam tshig gis/_/gsang sngags ma tshang med par bzla/_/rang gi rig pa'i ngo bo ste/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum bzhugs pa yi/_khyod kyis oM gyis gzung bar gyis/_/de ltar de kho na nyid gsum bstan to/_/de nas phyag rgya drug gis dbang bskur la/_lung bstan pa'o/_/
[\[85b.2\]]bdag nyid gtso bo'i nga rgyal du byas te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing mngon sum du byas la/_lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos kyi tha ma snying gar gzung ste/_lag pa g.yas pa skyabs sbyin du byas la/_shar la sogs pa'i gau rims kyis lung bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[85b.3\]]oM rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_/mgrin pa gcig tu lung bstan to/_/'di ltar nga yis lung bstan nas/_rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/_/srid pa'i mtha' nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/srid pa ngan 'gro rnams las 'grol/_/kye
[\[85b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo/_/zhes bya ba 'di/_ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha b+hur b+hu ba swaH 'di ltar rigs bzhi'i rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang las kyi bdag nyid du lung bstan to/_/de yi dbang bskur gyur pa yi/_/sngags pa 'gro ba kun gyi bdag_/phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid la/_/bla na med pa'i
[\[85b.5\]]byang chub tu/_/bde gshegs kyis kyang lung bstan mdzod/_/de la 'di ltar bstan te/_sngags dang phyag rgyas rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang du gyur pa'i phyir/_bstan par bya ba'i lung bstan pa'o/_/de nas dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa de dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/_gsang mchog dkyil 'khor dam
[\[85b.6\]]pa ni/_/mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas/_/sdig pa kun las nges par grol/_/khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas/_/bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/_/slar khyod 'chi ba la sogs med/_/mi tshugs pa dang mchog 'bras bu/_/cis kyang mi tshugs dga' bar gyis/_/srid pa'i
[\[85b.7\]]sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/_/dam pa'i srid pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/_/dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/_/rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/_/dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/_/gang zhig skyed pa
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]tsam gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/_/byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/_/phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa/_/dam pa'i chos ni mi spang zhing /_/nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/mi shes pas ni rmongs pa la/_/tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o/_/bdag nyid yongs
[\[86a.2\]]su spangs nas su/_/dka' thub kyis ni ma gdungs shid/_/ci bde bar ni gzung bar bya/_/'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/_/nam yang yongs su mi dor zhing /_/slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/_/sangs rgyas
[\[86a.3\]]tshul mtshungs bla ma yi/_/slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas/_/rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/_/rims dang du ga dang dbyig dug nad/_/mkha' 'gro rnams kyi chad pa dang /_/gnod dang log 'dren gtum po yis/_/bsad nas sems can dmyal
[\[86a.4\]]bar ltung /_/de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/_/rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/_/dge ba rab tu mi bcom pa/_/nam yang smod par mi bya'o/_/bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/_/rjes mthun khyod kyis dbul bar bya/_/des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/_/phyir yang 'byung bar mi
[\[86a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung /_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/_/rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/_/de phul sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/rtag tu phul ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de phul bsod nams tshogs yin te/_/tshogs
[\[86a.6\]]las dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/_/gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/_/deng khyod nye bar 'bras bur gnas/_/dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par/_/deng khyod 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/_/kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/_/khams
[\[86a.7\]]gsum gyi ni rgyal chen po/_/rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/_/deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/_/grong khyer mchog tu rab tu bzhugs/_/khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/_/de nyid thob par the tshom med/_/de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/_/rang gi dam tshig
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]mi zad bde chen bstan par gyis/_/deng 'dir 'gro ba myur te rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang dam tshig bcu bzhi bstan/_/de ltar slob ma mnyes gshin pas/_/bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_/gtso bo 'di ltar bka' stsal
[\[86b.2\]]pa'i/_/gsung gi de bzhin bka' bgyid do/_/zhes pa ni dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'o/_/de nas rjes su gnang ba pa ni/_/de nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas gser gyi thur ma la bsngags te/_bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer dang mtshungs par ye shes kyi mig sman gyis
[\[86b.3\]]mig dbye bar brtsam par bya'o/_/bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/_/mig gi rab rib nyes pa rnams/_/ji ltar mig sman mkhan po ltar/_/de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' yis/_/sbyor bas rab rib bsal bar bya/_/oM badzra ne tra ya a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrIH slob ma'i mig gnyis la mchog
[\[86b.4\]]gi yi ge bsams la/_thur ma dang 'od zer gyis bsal bar bya'o/_/oM badzra satwa zhes pas de nas me long bstan la/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/_/gzung du med cing brjod du med/_/rgyu dang
[\[86b.5\]]las las kun du byung /_/de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/_/ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/_/'di ltar chos rnams thams cad shes/_/rang bzhin med cing gzhi med pas/_/sems can don ni mnyam med byos/_/skyob pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/de nas dril bu dkrol zhing me
[\[86b.6\]]long gi gzugs brnyan bstan la/_chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'di ltar shes par gyis shig ces bka' bsgo la tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/_/thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor phyir/_/kun gyi mchog ni mnyam
[\[86b.7\]]nyid gsal/_/rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar/_/dag cing gsal la dri ma med/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/_/bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas/_/gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di yin par shes par gyis shig_/ces brjod
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]la me long snying gar gtug go/_/de nas ho las skyes pa'i gzhu lag tu byin la/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su sgrubs shig_/bdud bzhi rnam par 'dul bar gyis shig ces mgo la phyogs bzhir gzhu bzhi dgang bar bya'o/_/steng dang 'og tu yang ngo /_/
[\[87a.2\]]de nas oM badzra he tu maM zhes pas 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bzhag la oM badzra b+ha Sha raM zhes pas dung lag pa g.yas su sbyin/_dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po las glegs bam dang /_dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las dril bur gyur pa las lag pa g.yon du byin la 'di skad brjod do/_/'di nas
[\[87a.3\]]brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis shig_/de ring phan chad 'jig rten la/_/skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/_/kun du ma lus gang bar bgyis/_/so ma nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing /_/dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/_/
[\[87a.4\]]gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog_/'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/_/de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la/_/phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang /_/kun du khyod la srung bar byed/_/gzhan yang go rims ji lta ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan
[\[87a.5\]]par byas la/_sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/_/'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/_/ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba'i/_/de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang /_/rin po che dang pad+ma dang /_/phrin las 'khor lo rnams go rims/_/tshigs bshad
[\[87a.6\]]'di yi rim pa las/_/sh+loka ni lnga po yis/_/rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o/_/de la brtul zhugs la sogs pa'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'i bar du dbang bzhi pa rdzogs nas sbyin zer ba yang yod do/_/de la skabs 'dir ni bzhi pa'i rim pa'i sngon du 'gro zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[87a.7\]]de nas slob ma la bsang gtor la sogs pa byas te/_slob dpon rdo rje slob dpon gyi/_/mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs byas la/_/slob ma'i lag par ni/_phyag gdub sngags kyi bsrung ba gdags/_/steng du gdugs ni gzung bya ste/_/rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]bskor ba gsum byas la/_phyag rgya drug gis dbang bskur la/_/de ring 'di ltar slob ma yis/_/rgyud kyi don rnam 'dzin 'gyur te/_/gdugs bsal nas ni slob ma la/_/gzengs bstod phyir ni 'di skad brjod/_/da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/_/gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par
[\[87b.2\]]'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/_/khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chog bzhin/_/nan tan bskyed de bri bar bya/_/sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/_/de nas rang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad/_/bzlas
[\[87b.3\]]nas sngags 'di khyod la sbyin/_/sngags 'di rgyal ba kun la nye/_/zhes brjod la sbyin par bya'o/_/slob mas kyang /_bcom ldan bdag gis legs par gzung /_/sngags kyi dngos grub nye bar 'gyur/_/gsang sngags gzung ste bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas slob ma phyag rgya bzhi bstan
[\[87b.4\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_/'di skad brjod do/_/khyed kyis dus 'di nas bzung ste phyag rgya bzhi mi shes pa'am/_phyag rgya gcig mi shes pa la phyag rgya gcig kyang bstan par ma byed cig ces bsgo'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba dang dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya la rjes su
[\[87b.5\]]ma zhugs pa'i phyir/_thob pa'i 'bras bu la the tshom du gyur pa yin pas de dag la bstan par mi bya'o/_/gal te bstan par byas na sgro 'dogs dang skur ba'i rang bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir/_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ba yin pas na/_de lta bu la ston par ma byed cig
[\[87b.6\]]ces bsgo'o/_/'di dag ni thun mong gi slob dpon gyi dbang ngo //_khyad par gyi lag pa rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pas/shes rab dril bu de nyid ni/_/bcu drug lon pa'i shes rab tu/_/dmigs te lag pas legs 'khyud nas/_/mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/de ni slob
[\[87b.7\]]dpon yin par bshad/_/de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ngo /_/slob dpon gyi dbang de nyid ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes kyang bya/_rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang zhes kyang bya'o/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i slob dpon gyi dbang zhes bya'o/_/de la rig pa'i dbang dang
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]slob dpon gyi dbang gis ni bum pa'i dbang zhes bya ste/_dbang thams cad kyi dus su khyad par dang thun mong gi bum pas dbang bskur ba'i phyir bum pa'i dbang zhes bya'o/_/des ni lus kyi sgrib pa dag cing sku'i dbang thob pa dang /_sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin yin
[\[88a.2\]]pas bum pa'i dbang zhes bya'o//_//slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis/_/slob dpon dbang skur tshang nas ni/_/gsang dbang skal ldan gang zhig la/_/de la dam tshig sbyin bya ste/_/mchog gi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug_/mi la sogs pa'i sha lnga dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga
[\[88a.3\]]nyid bsten byas na/_/dgyes pa rdo rje'i dngos grub thob/_/gzhan gyis srog kyang gcad par bya/_/brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bya zhing /_/ma byin par yang blang bya ste/_/gzhan gyi bud med rtag tu bsten/_/sems ni rtse gcig brtan bya ste/_/ma rig las byung sems 'khrul gsad/_/dngos
[\[88a.4\]]kun rang bzhin med pa dang /_/'jig rten sgrol phyir brdzun du smra/_/rang gi bde ba mi spong zhing /_/rtogs dka'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir/_/ma byin pa nyid blang ba yin/_/spros bral ma skyes btsun mo ni/_/rtogs pas gzhan gyi bud med bsten/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/
[\[88a.5\]]de dag dam tshig yin par gsungs/_/bzang po mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/_/dam tshig de dag legs par gzung /_/de nas mchod pa rnam lnga yis/_/khyad par kun dang ldan byas la/_/dngos grub sdom pa ldan pa'i phyir/_/slob dpon gyis ni slob ma mchod/_/de nyid dam tshig
[\[88a.6\]]sbyin pa yin/_/de nas slob mas slob dpon la/_/tshogs kyi 'khor lo phul nas ni/_/slob mas rig ma brgyad po 'di/_/ma dang sring mo nyid dang ni/_/bu mo dang ni tsha mo dang /_/de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang /_/ma yi spun zla sgyug mo dang /_/de bzhin pha yi sring mo nyid/_/rig ma
[\[88a.7\]]brgyad du rab tu grags/_/lha mo brgyad kyi rang bzhin te/_/bsgrubs na dngos grub 'byin pa'o/_/de nas rig ma brgyad po de dag dang mi ldan na/_rigs lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i rig ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa gang dang ldan pa dbul bar bya'o/_/gar ma tshos ma g.yung mo dang /_/gtum
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]mo dang ni bram ze mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las skyes/_/rig ma lngar ni rab tu bshad/_/de dag rnal 'byor pas mchod bya/_/nam du 'khyud dang 'o byas te/_/de la chags pa'i rol pa bya/_/rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba yis/_/der ni chang ni btung bya ste/_/sha dang sha chen bza' bar bya/_/
[\[88b.2\]]de la btung ba'i ston mo sbyin/_/de nas yang ni mchod par bya/_/de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la/_/slob ma nang du gzhug par bya/_/ras kyis mig ni dgab byas la/_/phyis ni dkyil 'khor bstan byas te/_/sA lu skyes mchod sbyar ba dang /_/chang gis rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/_/bde chen
[\[88b.3\]]dum bu gcig par ni/_/bdud rtsi dang bcas chang gis bkang /_/skal ldan chen pos slob dpon dang /_/ston pa nyid la mchod byas te/_/bdag kyang dgyes pa chen po yis/_/phyag 'tshal nas ni btung bar byas/_/byin dang len pa'i phyag rgya ni/_/pad+ma lta bu phye bya ste/_/yang dang yang
[\[88b.4\]]du phyag 'tshal yin/_/ma dang tsha mo sgyug mo dang /_/zhang po'i chung ma dag la ni/_/mchod na dngos grub myur du thob/_/sems la rtog pa med pa'i phyir/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i tshogs la spyod de/_rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs thams cad 'dod pa'i
[\[88b.5\]]rol pas yongs su spyod de/_mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad dang ldan pas rdo rje klu la sogs pa'i dgyes pa'i spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par byas nas/_tshogs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bsdus te/_de nas yol bal sogs pas sa phyogs dben par byas la/_bla re dang rlung g.yab
[\[88b.6\]]kyis phyogs bzhir brgyan par byas la/_bde zhing 'jam pa'i stan bting ste/_sa phyogs de dri zhim po'i spos dang mar me phyogs bzhir bltam par bya'o/_/de lta bur slob dpon dang las kyi phyag rgya bzhugs te/_rig ma de rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'am/_slob dpon gang la
[\[88b.7\]]dad pa ni skra 'jam zhing 'khyil pa dang /_zhal mdzes shing dri zhim pos byugs pa dang mig dkyus ring ba dang /_mdog sngo ba sangs su gyur pa nu ma'i mtshams 'brel ba dang /_ro stod che zhing rked skabs phra ba dang /_gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan pa dang /_rigs mtho zhing snying
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]rje dang ldan pa dang /_brtan zhing dbang dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag nyid dang mi 'bral ba/_sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_sih+la dang ga pur byugs la/_yang na ji ltar rnyed pa'i rig ma lo bcu gnyis lon pa'am/_lo bcu drug ma slob mas slob dpon
[\[89a.2\]]la phul la de lta bu'i rig ma yongs su gzung ste/_khyad par gyi ras dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan zhing /_khyad par gyi byug pa yid 'phrog pas lus la byugs te/_bde ba bsgrub pa'i don du 'khyud par byas la/_de nas rig ma dang ldan pa'i slob dpon mthong na mchod pa rnam
[\[89a.3\]]pa lnga dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dril bu dang /_sna tshogs pa'i ras dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_chang dang /_sha la sogs pa de lta bu'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par gyis mchod nas bstod pa bya ste/_kye kye gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/_/zhi ba chen po'i
[\[89a.4\]]bdag nyid can/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog 'gyur te/_/phyag rgya che dang gnyis med pa'i/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag las skyes/_/yang dag don mchog khyod lta bus/_/bdag kyang gtso bo'i bka' drin gyis/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'dam nas ni/_/'dren pa khyod kyis bskyab
[\[89a.5\]]par mdzod/_/ces gsol te/_de nas slob dpon gyis/_/rig ma la tshems kyis ma mchu gzhib par byas te/_nu ma gnyis lag pas bzung nas/_/pad+ma'i nang du lag pas reg la/_rkang pa gnyis phrag gong du bzhag ste/_'dod pa mthar phyin par spyod cing bde ba
[\[89a.6\]]rgyas par bya'o/_/ji srid bde ba ma 'phel gyi bar du kun du ru'i bde bas bsgrub par bya'o/_/de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid rtogs par byas la/_bde ba skye ba'i dus su/_kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod nas/_lha'i rnal 'byor mngon du
[\[89a.7\]]byas la/_shes rab ma dang slob ma'i gdong bcings nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu bas gang ba/_zla ba lta bur rgyas pa kun du ru'i sbyor bas rdo rje nor bu'i nang du phyin pa dang /_rgan po dang ming med kyis bzung nas slob ma'i khar dbab par bya'o/_/de nas 'di
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]ltar brjod par bya ste/_ci ltar de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/bde ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' sras bcas la/_/dam pa'i don du dbang bskur sbyin/_/de bzhin bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang /_/bskur ba bzhin du legs par gzung /_/de nas
[\[89b.2\]]slob mas legs par brtags te/_thob pa dang /_a ho su khaM a ho su khaM zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lce'i lam nas ci lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pas thob par bya'o/_/rig ma yang gcer bur gnas te/_rdo rje dang pad+ma las byung ba'i slob ma la kun du rus sbyin pa'i rim
[\[89b.3\]]pas sbyin par bya'o/_/des ni ngag gi nyes pa dag cing gsang ba'i dbang thob ste/_longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i rang bzhin yin pa la/_gsang ba'i dbang gi rim pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/_rig ma de nyid dam gzhan
[\[89b.4\]]dag la byas nas/_ji ltar sngon bzhin du kun du ru'i sbyor ba dang ldan par byas la/_slob ma yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de nas slob dpon langs te/_slob ma chen po'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /_khro ba dang phrag dog spangs par bltas la
[\[89b.5\]]rig ma sbyin par bya'o/_/mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/slob ma rjes su gnang ba sbyin/_/khyod ni snying rje snying brtser ldan/_/sems chen ldan pa 'di zung shig_/kun du ru sbyor dag ldan pas/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur/_/mchog dang gnas chen sbyin lha mo/_/sna tshogs gzugs te yid
[\[89b.6\]]'phrog ma/_/zung shig zung shig sems chen mo/_/zung ste mchod pa de nyid sbyor/_/de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag tu rig ma gtad la/_de la dga' ba skye ba ste/_/skad cig dbye bas dbye bar bya/_/skad cig shes pas bde ba shes/_/e waM rnam pas rab tu gnas/_/dang por
[\[89b.7\]]dga' ba tsam yin te/_/dam par dga' ba gnyis pa yin/_/dga' bral dga' ba gsum par shes/_/bzhi pa lhan cig skyes de bzhin/_/cung zad dga' ba bde ba ste/_/dam par dga' ba da bas lhag_/dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin/_/lhan cig skyes pa kun dang bral/_/
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]dang por reg par 'dod pa ste/_/gnyis pa bde ba 'dod pa'o/_/gsum pa 'dod chags 'joms pa nyid/_/de nas bzhi pa bsgom par bya/_/dang por dga' ba srid par brjod/_/'dod chags bral phyir mya ngan 'das/_/bar ma dga' ba tsam nyid de/_/de dag rnam spangs
[\[90a.2\]]lhan cig skyes/_/sna tshogs pa dang rnam par smin/_/de bzhin rnam nyed mtshan nyid bral/_/skad cig bzhi la brten nas ni/_/de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes kyis/_/rnam pa sna tshogs du mar brjod/_/'khyud dang 'o byed la sogs pa'o/_/rnam par smin pa de las gzhan/_/bde ba za ba'i
[\[90a.3\]]ye shes so/_/rnam par nyed la rtog pa ste/_/bdag gi bde ba 'dren pa'o/_/mtshan nyid bral ba de las gzhan/_/chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/_/dang por dga' ba rnam sna tshogs/_/dam pa'i dga' ba rnam par smin/_/dga' bral dga' ba rnam par nyed/_/lhan cig
[\[90a.4\]]skyes dga' mtshan nyid bral/_/chags pa ma yin chags bral min/_/dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa/_/gsum po spangs pa'i bdag nyid ni/_/lhan cig skyes pa yin par bshad/_/dga' bral la sogs rab brtags te/_/dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid kyang /_/dga' bral
[\[90a.5\]]dang ni mchog dga'i dbus/_/lhan cig skyes pa der gnas te/_/stong dang stong min he ru ka_/'di dag bgrang ba'i rim pa'o/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul gyis dga' bral gyi dbus su lhan cig skyes pa brtag par bya'o/_/de nas rig ma khyad par can gyis sgrub pa po la bltas te/_/'di
[\[90a.6\]]skad brjod par bya'o/_/dri chen dri chu za ba 'di/_/bu khyod kyis ni nus sam ci/_/khu ba khrag dang de bzhin du/_/rtag tu bud med gus pa dang /_/bdag gi pad+ma la ni gzhibs/_/ji ltar bde ba bu khyod smos/_/sgrub pa pos kyang 'di skad brjod/_/lha mo bdag gis cis mi nus/_/khu ba khrag
[\[90a.7\]]sogs bza' ba dang /_/rtag tu bud med gus bgyid dang /_/b+ha ga la ni 'o bgyid do/_/de nas dga' ba chen po thob par gyur te/_gos dang bral la/_gur gum dang gla rtsi dang tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos bskus te/_dri zhim po me tog gi phreng ba cod pan du byas te/_ji ltar chu skyes

[\[90b.1\]]dri mas ma gos pa ltar/_nang gi chu skyes kha phye ba ltar bstan la/_shes rab mas 'di brjod de/_e ma'o/_/bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa/_/bdag gi pad+ma rmad byung la/_/gang zhig cho gas mnyes byed pa/_/de yi mdun du bdag ni 'dug_/yang dag sangs rgyas mnyes byed phyir/_/

[\[95a.1\]]kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs te/_bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas/_aSh+TA na nA 'am/_hUM gi sgras de dang lhan cig tu phyin pa'i bgegs bskrad par bya'o/_/dzaH hUM baM hoH'i sngags kyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo sku gzugs la sogs pa la/_dgug pa dang gzhug
[\[95a.2\]]pa dang bcing ba dang dgyes par byas nas/_spyan dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs te/_dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de yang bsang gtor la sogs pa phul nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa so so'i sngags dang ldan pas mchod par bya'o/_/de la sngags ba mnyam par bzhag
[\[95a.3\]]nas me tog snyim par bzung la/_nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/_/zhes pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi tshig 'di brjod do/_/yi ge brgya pa yang lan bdun du bzlas shing bskor bar bya'o/_/de ltar brtan par byas nas sems can thams cad kyi don du gsol ba gdab
[\[95a.4\]]pa ni/_'di ltar bde gshegs skyob pa yis/_/thams cad du ni sems can don/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin 'gyur nas/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa snang bar mdzod/_/de nas sngon bzhin du phyir byung ste/_gtor ma rgya chen po bshams la/_
[\[95a.5\]]phyogs skyong ba rnams bdud rtsis tshim par byas nas mchod de rang rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs la/_bskor ba gsum byas nas phyag 'tshal te/_dman pa dang lhag pa'i las kyi kha bskrad par bya ba'i phyir/_rgyas pa'i
[\[95a.6\]]sbyin sreg brtsam par bya'o/_/sbyin sreg gi dus su bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_slob ma'i mthe bong g.yas pa nas bzung ste/_dgang blugs gsum la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas bla mas slob ma la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i yon
[\[95a.7\]]bslang bar bya ste/_slob ma dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pas rang gi 'byor ba'i sems dang sbyar te/_rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i btsun mo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_ba glang dang ma he la sogs pa'i dkor dang /_gser dang dngul dang zangs dang rin
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]po che dang mu tig la sogs pa nor bu'i khyad par rnams dang /_'bru dang bcas pa'i gzhi dang /_sa gzhi dang /_skyed shing rab dang khang pa la sogs pa ci yod pa dbul bar bya'o/_/slob dpon mnyes par gyur pas ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur te/_mnyes pas
[\[95b.2\]]mchog gi dngos grub thob/_/de nas tsA ru bsgrub par bya ste/_snod legs par bkrus la/_dgang blugs kyi lhag ma dang /_sbrang dang 'o ma dang kha ra la sogs pa mchog gi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te/_gtso bo'i sngags kyang bzlas par bya'o/_/oM di bya ni sa mA d+hi d+h+ya na/_pra Ni
[\[95b.3\]]ni swA hA'i sngags kyis gser la sogs pa'i rin po che'i snod du blugs la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/_/de nas lha khang dang khyams su lugs sku la sogs pa la/_legs par byas pa'i khri'am/_sa stegs las byas pa'i steng du bzhugs su gsol ba ni
[\[95b.4\]]dgye ba dang /_sgu ba dang /_yo ba ma yin par oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swA hA/_zhes brjod la gzhag go/_/de ltar ma byas na skyon du 'gyur ro/_/de la sngon bzhin du bsang gtor la sogs pa sbyin nas yongs su mchod de/_bstod nas bdud rtsi myang bar byas nas/_yi ge brgya pa'i sngags
[\[95b.5\]]brgya phrag gcig brjod de/_bzod par gsol bar bya'o/_/bzod pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/lha dang sangs rgyas rigs 'dzin dang /_tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams la/_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga rnams/_/ma 'tshal ba dang ma tshogs dang /_/bzod pa chen po rab mdzad

[\[95b.7\]]chu dang rlung dang sa/_/'byung ba'i lha rnams thams cad kyis/_/nang gi 'byung ba'i phung po la/_/legs par bsrung ste cho gar gyis/_/slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang /_/bu dang tsha mo 'khor bcas dang /_/de dag bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/_/gzhan yang khyad par 'di dag
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]gsungs/_/ri mor bris dang 'bur sku la/_/gong gi rim pas rab gnas la/_/mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas/_/lha rnams la yang mchod par byas te/_rol mo'i tshogs dang ldan pas bskor ba lan gsum byas/_smon lam rgya chen po gdab par bya'o/_/
[\[96a.2\]]de nas rang gi gnas su song ste/_dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rnams la mchod ston rgya chen po byas nas gzhan yang ji ltar 'byor pas mchod ston rgya chen po bya'o/_/slob dpon 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gtsug lag khang
[\[96a.3\]]gi mkhan mo dang /_gnyer byed la sogs pa spyan drangs la mchod ston dang dbul ba rgya chen po byas te/_dgyes par byas nas bzod gsol bya'o/_/mtshan mo'i dus su tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang mchod pa rgya chen po bya'o/_/de nas sngags pas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs la
[\[96a.4\]]yongs su mchod de/_g.yas su spos gzung zhing g.yon nas dril bu dkrol la bstod pa byas te/_yi ge gsum gyi mthar muHdang ldan pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/_/de nas tshon rtsi bsdus te/_gtsang ma'i snod du blugs la/_gang zhig 'dod pa la nyung du nyung du byin nas

[\[96b.3\]]zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ {D1271}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_he badzra dwi b+hu dza sA d+ha naM/_bod skad du/_kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs/_rje btsun thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khrag 'thung 'jig rten gsum 'phen dang /_/dpal mgon bla ma la btud
[\[96b.4\]]de/_/de sgrub cho ga zhi ba yi/_/zhal snga nas gsungs rab dbye bya/_/dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_/bdag med ma yis mgul nas 'khyud/_/'khor lo la sogs rgyan dang ldan/_/spyan gsum zhabs gnyis 'dam skyes mnga'/_/rgyud 'dir bsgom pa la dbang bar bya
[\[96b.5\]]ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_nang par snga bar mal nas langs te/_rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM bltas la/_de'i 'od zer gyis dpal he ru ka snang bar byas te/_me tog la sogs pa'i nye bar spyod pa lngas legs par mchod nas/_de'i spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /_

[\[97a.1\]]thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la/_oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa d+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po/_/de nas sad par byas la nam mkha'i phyogs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM yig ste de

[\[97b.1\]]sems dpa' spyan drangs te/_dzaH hUM baM hoH/_zhes bya'i sngags 'dis dgug pa dang /_gzhug pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_dbang du byas nas/_'o ma dang chu bzhin du ro mnyam par bya'o/_/de ma thag tu rang gi snying ga'i nyi ma la rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig las byung ba'i 'od

[\[98a.1\]]pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du 'bar ba yid kyis mngon par bris la/_rim pa brjod pa bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas pa bya'o/_/gung dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams ni yud tsam gyis dpal he ru ka'i gzugs su byas te/_de nas mig la

[\[98b.1\]]'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba'i bdag_/skyabs med khyab bdag nyid kyis skyobs/_/slob ma'i spyi bor lag bzhag nas/_/bla mas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs/_/khro bo'i sa bon snying gar dgod/_/de 'byung khro bo'i tshogs kyis ni/_/slob ma'i sdig pa'i phung po rnams/_/

[\[99a.1\]]rgyas thams cad nyid/_/rab bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje gzung /_/slob ma rta yi mchog bsgoms te/_/sgrol ma lhan cig kha ni sbyar/_/rdo rje'i bdag pos dbang bskur te/_/rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi bdag_/dril bus khyod ni dbang bskur ro/_/

[\[99b\]]
