[\[351a.2\]]rig bde ba chen po nyid/_/rgyu la mi gnas mthar thug pa/_/theg chen rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yin/_/rin chen gsung gis shes 'gyur te/_/bsam med brjod bya snying po'i don/_/kun gyi brjod pa sems kyi dbyings/_/rang rang mos pa'i shes pa rtogs/_/lam gyi rtsol bas 'bras bu tshol/_/
[\[351a.3\]]rang mos bsam pa'i sa la gnas/_/sman pa'i 'dod pas re ba 'jog_/snying po lam la 'dod pa bral/_/yid la mi byed rang bzhin gnas/_/rig pa'i gzer gyis 'da' ba med/_/sgom pa med la bya ba bral/_/lta ba med pa'i snying po ni/_/rang gzhag sems kyi rig pas shes/_/char
[\[351a.4\]]yang dang ni thig le tshul/_/tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog don/_/shes rab gsang bas na ro la/_/snyan khung brgyud pa bzhi yi gnas/_/rdo rje bka' ni rtogs pa'i lam/_/byed pa'i sgra la gnyer ba'i sems/_/tshul bzang rtsol la gang gnas pa/_/byed pa'i don dang phrad gyur
[\[351a.5\]]nas/_/bya ba'i rang bzhin shes par bya/_/rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rig pa nyid/_/gsum gyi byed pa'i 'od kyis mthong /_/gsum gyi 'od gsal gzhi yi lam/_/byed dang bral ba nyid la gnas/_/lam gyis lam gyi 'bras bu mthong /_/'bras bu dgongs pa rgyal ba'i thugs/_/
[\[351a.6\]]bsam med rang gzhag rig pa'i dang /_/bde chen mi rtog rgyu ba bral/_/yid la mi byed snang ba dag_/rim pa ma 'gags ye shes gsal/_/dbang po pad+ma rgyas pa'i sems/_/'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/mthong ba log pa gzhan yod kyang /_/sprul sku dang po gzhan las
[\[351a.7\]]min/_/kun bzang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa nyid/_/snang ba'i dus ma bzung byas la/_/dran pa'i tshul gyis nyams su blangs/_/'phen pa dang po'i dus na'o/_/rin chen gsung gis brtags pa las/_/thabs kyi bye brag shes 'gyur na/_/thog ma pad+ma ji bzhin no/_/dkyil 'khor
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]lnga yi ye shes 'phro/_/de ldan rgyal ba'i gral du gnas/_/thugs rjes kun ldan rnyog pas bslad/_/dngas ma dus gsum 'gyur ba med/_/gsang ba'i pad+ma sngags kyi sems/_/spyod pa bral ba'i dus na shes/_/btang gzhag rang bzhin ma tsha bral/_/'khor ba rnam par mi sems te/_/mya
[\[351b.2\]]ngan 'das pa'i rgyu ba bral/_/rdzogs pa'i dgongs pa bya ba med/_/dus gsum ma yengs srog tu sems/_/blang dor mi mnga' lta ba med/_/rang bzhin rgyal ba'i lta ba yin/_/mi rtsol dbu ma dang po lam/_/gang gis ma bcos thugs kyi lam/_/snying ga pad+ma rin chen 'od/_/'od
[\[351b.3\]]gsal rig pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga/_/chags pa la sogs nyon mongs lnga/_/mthar thug tha ma dus na mthong /_/gang skyes dus na yul mi dpyad/_/mi 'gag ngo bo nyid la gzhag_/gsang ba'i pad+ma chos kyi sku/_/ma bcos rang gsal gzung 'dzin bral/_/rdzogs pa'i longs spyod
[\[351b.4\]]bde ba'i sku/_/sprul sku gang la ngos gzung med/_/dbyer med rig pa gcig la gnas/_/'dzin dang bral ba'i mngon sum pa/_/chags dang bral ba'i bde ba che/_/tha snyad bral ba'i thabs kyis mtshon/_/rtsod dang bral ba'i spyod pas blang /_/spro bsdu med pa'i dgongs par gnas/_/snang
[\[351b.5\]]ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin/_/rang bzhin rig pa de bzhin no/_/yon tan sna tshogs nam mkha' bzhin/_/dus gsum 'gyur med kun du bzang /_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med/_/'khor ba nyid na rang bzhin dag_/rin chen dag pa ji bzhin no/_/ji ltar bcos kyang 'gyur ba
[\[351b.6\]]med/_/rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo la/_/sgro skur spros pa dang gis med/_/'dzin pa'i spyod pa log pas bslad/_/rang 'byung rig pa'i don ma rtogs/_/rang 'byung kun mkhyen rig pa'i thugs/_/'gyur med 'gro ba kun la gnas/_/mkha' 'dra ye shes lhun gyis grub/_/sgrub
[\[351b.7\]]med dngos grub chen po la/_/bsrung med dam tshig rang gzhag ste/_/mtha' med dbus med rig par gsal/_/rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo la/_/sems can kun gyi rang bzhin yin/_/ye shes rig pa rtogs gyur nas/_/thugs rje mdzad pa'i lam yang ston/_/sems kyi 'bras bu rang
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]gzhag la/_/'dod pa'i rtsol bas sgrub mi byed/_/byang chub sems kyi lam chen ni/_/rnam dag ye shes dgongs pa'i lam/_/thun mong 'gro ba yongs la gnas/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas las byung ba/_/bgrod med rang rig ye shes lam/_/rang 'dod bltas
[\[352a.2\]]pas grub pa med/_/rdzogs pa'i lam la gang gnas pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rang gzhag la/_/yid la mi byed yengs pa med/_/rnal 'byor rdzogs pa bcos med la/_/'dod rtsol thig le spro bsdu med/_/ye nas rdzogs pa'i rnam dag la/_/bsam gtan yan lag kun
[\[352a.3\]]dang ldan/_/rlung gi 'jug pa rang bzhin zhi/_/ye shes brtsal med bde ba la/_/dga' ba bzhi yi bde ba gnas/_/gang spyod thabs la ma brten yang /_/rin chen snang ba'i thabs kyis shes/_/brda sprod tshig la gnas 'gyur yang /_/thig le rang byung nyid la 'chang /_/rtog dpyod yan
[\[352a.4\]]lag the tshom bral/_/sems kyi dga' bde rtsol ba med/_gnas brtse gcig g.yengs pa med/_bde mtshan nyid chos skur gnas/_ye shes gsang ba thabs chan gyis/_sems kyi bag chags thebs chen gyi/_/gyur ba gsum la de bzhin 'gyur/_/sems kyi ye shes gter
[\[352a.5\]]kha dbye/_/rang byung ye shes 'od gsal la/_rgyu med rig pa gdod nas gnas/_ye shes rang gnas bde ba che/_/kun mkhyen me long lta bu nyid/_/ma lus snang ba'i rang bzhin dag_/sems kyi chos nyid bde ba shes/_/kun bzang nyams cig cir ma mthong /_/mthong med gsal ba'i
[\[352a.6\]]me long nyid/_/dngos po med pa'i rig pa yin/_/'dra'am mi 'dra rgyu gang nyid/_/bdag gam gzhan nam de nyid gang /_/grub bam ma grub ji ltar bskyed/_/de ltar grub na thug pa med/_/de ltar min na gang zhig ni/_/gnyis ka de med ri bong rwa/_/gang gzhan rgyu las grub pa ni/_/gcig dang du
[\[352a.7\]]ma gang du 'grub/_/'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos bzhin na/_/yang dag ye shes brdzun nam ci/_/de ltar bdag lta log pa bzhin/_/spang bya nyid 'gyur yang dag min/_/mi mthun gnas pa'i chos yin na/_/zhen pa nyid 'gyur de nyid rig_/de lta min na gang zhig 'thad/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa gang
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]gnas par/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang 'jug pa/_/gang gis gang zhig ji ltar gnas/_/rtsol ba'i bskyed pa de nyid dam/_/ye shes rig pa'i don la 'jug_/de nyid yin na de lta mod/_/de lta min na gang zhig 'thad/_/thams cad thams cad grub pa'am/_/ma yin de la 'thad pa gang /_/rjes
[\[352b.2\]]mthun rgyu yis mi gnas na/_/de bzhin rjes mthun nyid du 'gyur/_/des na seng ge phru gu bzhin/_/sku gsum lhun grub bde ba'i lam/_/rtsol ba'i 'bras bu mthar phyung nas/_/'jig rten chos la'ang de bzhin no/_/sbyang bya 'bras bu yin pa na/_/khyod la dag pa'i ye shes gang /_/de lta nyid na
[\[352b.3\]]rtag par 'gyur/_/des na rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i lam/_/rgyu la mi gnas rtsol ba med/_/rang gnas ye shes gdod nas grub/_/grub pa'i rang bzhin bskyed mi dgos/_/ye gsal nam mkha'i rang bzhin pas/_/gsal byed rnam pa ji bzhin no/_/zla ba gzugs 'dra gang gis 'byung /_/
[\[352b.4\]]dbyings kyi 'bras bu bsam mi khyab/_/mi rtog 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/che ba'i sku gsum mu mtha' med/_/ye shes rig pa thug phrad du/_/rin chen snang bas gzhag par bya/_/brjod bral rig pa thog babs nyid/_/ma brtsal rang 'byung bde ba nyid/_/yi ge med pa'i gsum mchog
[\[352b.5\]]ste/_/kun bzang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ston/_/mi rtog don mjal goms shing rtogs/_/yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung /_/don gyi chos nyid mjal bar ston/_/gsang sngags gter gyi mdzad 'dzin cing /_/rgyal ba'i grag sngags tha snyad bral/_/sngags tshig bral ba'i nus mthu ldan/_/
[\[352b.6\]]las gzhi med pa'i don gyis 'grub/_/rgyu med 'bras bu mthar thug yin/_/rig pa mtha' bral dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/zhen med tshul gyis 'jug na bde/_/dang po rang sems tshul la brtag_/rig pa bla ma'i gdams pa bzhin/_/drong dang ldan na brda don sprad/_/dkyil 'khor drug
[\[352b.7\]]gi ye shes la/_/sgra yis mtha' la gzhag par bya/_/myong ba med pa'i rnam pa yin/_/tshor ba bral ba'i reg byas go/_/phyi rol tshul bzhin nges par 'gyur/_/tha mar dran bsams rgyu ba bral/_/dpa' rtul za byed sems lta bu/_/shes pa dang bzhag ma brtul ba/_/stag
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]lta bu sems la ni/_/ye shes rol pa mi 'gag pas/_/rtsol med ye shes rig pa'i dang /_/des na rang bzhin cog 'jog go/_/dngos po ji ltar snang ba yang /_/rang gi shes pa nyid du mthong /_/dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i/_/thugs la 'jog pa'i man ngag
[\[353a.2\]]bcud/_/rin chen shar bas rang la rdzogs/_/rtsol bral rig pa mi rtog pa/_/ma bcos rang snang bde ba'i klong /_/ye shes lhun grub klong du shar/_/rang 'byung nam mkha' lta bur khyab/_/rang gsal rig pa'i dang la gnas/_/spros bral ye shes thig le che/_/rnam rtog bral ba'i
[\[353a.3\]]rig pa gsal/_/rang gi cir yang mi rtog pa/_/ye shes rang gnas sems su gsal/_/ci yang mi rtog sems su smin/_/ci yang ma yin dmigs su med/_/rnam rtog sems kyi rgyu ba bral/_/rig pa'i ye shes 'dzin pa bral/_/rang snang rol pa byang chub sems/_/sgyu ma'i
[\[353a.4\]]ye shes bde ba'i klong /_/rang rig ye shes 'dzin pa yin/_/rang 'byung sgyu mar mngon sum gsal/_/lhun grub ye shes ma bcos pa/_/bde ba'i sgyu ma rang rig nyid/_/thams cad ye shes sems su 'char/_/rig pa'i ye shes don gsal ba/_/thams cad ye shes nyid
[\[353a.5\]]du mthong /_/ye shes ma yin gang yang med/_/khams gsum dngas ma ye shes nyid/_/ye shes rig pa'i thabs kyis shes/_/'khrul pa'i sa gnas brda bkrol te/_/ye shes rgyal ba'i gral du gzhag_/ma bcos sku gsung thugs su gnas/_/rang rig sems kyi 'bar ba
[\[353a.6\]]nyid/_/ye shes sems kyi phur pa thebs/_/rnam rtog bzhon pa rlung dang bral/_/dngos grub bde ba'i rang byung nyid/_/thar pa'i lam mchog byang chub sems/_/'bras bu mthar phyin rig pa nyid/_/rang byung sems kyi ji bzhin la/_/rnam pa'i rig pa thabs kyis gnas/_/bcos
[\[353a.7\]]med dgongs pa bde chen 'di/_/mngon sum mthong la ngos gzung med/_/rang shar dngos por grub pa med/_/bde chen rig pa ma mthong ste/_/'di dang bral na rtog pa nyid/_/bka' yi dam dang de mi ldan/_/dmus long mdun du gzugs snang bzhin/_/'bras bu mthar phyin yod
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]ma yin/_/kun bzang rgyal ba'i don dang 'gal/_/rang gsal dgongs pa'i thugs ma rig_/'dzin pa'i cha la gang gnas kyang /_/'khor ba'i 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur/_/rang 'dod don gyi mthar ma phyin/_/ye shes gsang ba bde ba'i sa/_/'dod pas mi 'grub thob pa med/_/'dod med rang
[\[353b.2\]]bzhin nyid las byung /_/shes pa rang lugs so ma nyid/_/kun bzang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'o/_/tha mal shes pa 'di nyid la/_/bsams pa'i sems med rang gzhag yin/_/nges pa'i gzhi ni don la gnas/_/yid ches bla ma nyid la gus/_/rin chen gdams ngag gter du 'chang /_/lung gi
[\[353b.3\]]dgongs pa'i don gsal te/_/rig pa rang gsal gtan la phebs/_/mi 'gyur rdo rje sems dpa' 'chang /_/ston pa rang rig nyid yin pas/_/drang ba'i don la sems mi 'jug_/phyi rol 'dod rtsol sems dang bral/_/rdzogs pa'i bka' la yid mi 'gyur/_/bla ma rin chen srog tu
[\[353b.4\]]'dzin/_/mos pa rang gi 'dod pa gtong /_/rin chen gter gyi ngo bo 'di/_/srog dang bral ba'i kha bzhin bsdam/_/rang sems byang chub sems 'di la/_/ye shes ma rig tha dad med/_/'khrul dang ma 'khrul rig par gcig_/zhen rtog brtags pa sna tshogs dang /_/ye shes 'od
[\[353b.5\]]gsal ngo bo nyid/_/'od gsal rang 'byung sems su gcig_/byang chub sems la ngo bo bral/_/don ldan ye shes nyid du mthong /_/bsam pas brtags pa sna tshogs pa/_/bag chags log pa'i rkyen gyis mthong /_/rang rig ye shes 'jug pa dang /_/rtog pa'i bag chags dang po
[\[353b.6\]]ni/_/sgrib pa ma lus bzhin grub cing /_/byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid la/_/thog ma dang bral tha ma med/_/thog med 'khor ba'i rang bzhin 'di/_/byang chub sems la ye nas dag_/sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu la/_/blo bur gzugs brnyan sprin gyis bsgribs/_/ngo bo ma yin rkyen gyis
[\[353b.7\]]snang /_/me dang lcags kyi rang bzhin 'dra/_/rang bzhin bral ba ma yin te/_/dus gsum ma yin nam mkha' bzhin/_/chos sku rang bzhin ye nas dag_/longs spyod rang gi bde ba nyid/_/sprul pa chu zla lta bur snang /_/dbyer med rig pa gcig gi dang /_blang dor gnyis bral mnyam pa
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]nyid/_/byang chub sems kyi ye shes la/_/snying po mnyam nyid yi sangs rgyas/_/snying po don la rtsol ba med/_/don gyi rang 'byung gnyis su med/_/sems kyi rang rig rtog pa nyid/_/rnam rtog ye shes nyid du 'bar/_/brtsal med 'bras bu mthar thug nyid/_/bka'
[\[354a.2\]]yi bcud 'dus snying po 'di/_/rgya mtsho bzhin du bdud rtsi 'dus/_/snying po'i don 'di gsang ba'i bcud/_/gsal ba'i sgron ma snying po 'di/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i 'khor lo yin/_/snying po gsung gis rtogs bya ba/_/sems nyid rang 'byung snying po nyid/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i
[\[354a.3\]]dkyil 'khor 'dus/_/'byung 'jug mi mnga' snying por gsal/_/rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i dgongs par gnas/_/ye shes snying po mkha' 'dra ba/_/mtha' dbus mi mnga' blang dor med/_/mi len snying po bdag med gsal/_/bka' yi bcud 'dus snying po 'di/_/rang bzhin snying
[\[354a.4\]]po sman chen rtogs/_/'khor ba'i zug rngu 'byin pa'i mchog_/byang chub sems kyi sman med na/_/rtsol ba'i 'jug pa mtho ris rgyu/_/sman chen rang la gnas bzhin du/_/mi rtog gzhan nas tshol bar byed/_/rnyed pas rang sems sman du mthong /_/rtogs pas gzhan nas ma 'ongs te/_/rang
[\[354a.5\]]'byung snying po thog ma med/_/spros bral nam mkha' lta bur gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku dang rang bzhin ldan/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i dang la bzhugs/_/bde ba'i don la ma chags rol/_/snang ba ye shes rig par gnas/_/byang chub sems kyi sman chen 'di/_/ye shes rgyal ba'i dgongs
[\[354a.6\]]pa ste/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas lam du bde/_/bsam gyis mi khyab dgongs pa ni/_/shes pa rang gzhag so ma nyid/_/snying po don rtogs bya ba bral/_/rang gsal rig pa'i ngang la bzhugs/_/bcos med 'dzin bral 'phro 'du med/_/byang chub rgyu ba snying po bral/_/kun 'byung rig pa
[\[354a.7\]]'pho 'gyur med/_/thugs rje rang 'byung ye shes nyid/_/rtsol bral rang snang byin rlabs 'byung /_/phyogs ris mi mnga' kun la khyab/_/snying po nyid du kun sgrol mdzad/_/byams pa chos nyid ngang du skyabs/_/dga' ba rang rig mi 'bral ba/_/blang dor gnyis med pa btod snyoms che/_/
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]rang 'byung snying po 'khor lo la/_/rtogs bral 'khor ba rang bzhin dag_/thugs rjes sems can don mi mdzad/_/dngos po mi mnga' rang 'byung sems/_/'od gsal snying po rdzogs pa 'di/_/rin chen gsung gis brtags pas shes/_/'gro drug sems can thams cad la/_/rang
[\[354b.2\]]gnas ye shes nyid ldan pa/_/brtags pa gsum gyis shes par 'gyur/_/ming dang sems la ye shes tshol/_/dngos po gang yang rung ba la/_/brtags pas rang log shes par 'byung /_/yid bzhin rin chen nor bu bzhin/_/'gyur ba med pa'i gnas lugs dang /_/thun mong dam
[\[354b.3\]]tshig gsum ldan pa'o/_/lce mnan nang yig sgra la sogs/_/de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang /_/snying po ye shes gzung bar bya/_/snying po gsung 'di don dang 'brel/_/skal ldan rin chen lta bu yis/_/grub mtha' ngan la gnas dus su/_/'di yis don kun rig par
[\[354b.4\]]gyis/_/'di yis rang sems ma rig na/_/sgra'am tshad ma gang gis kyang /_/rig pa'i ye shes rnyed mi 'gyur/_/gzhi nyid rang 'byung 'gyur pa med/_/rtog pa rang 'byung sems kyi lam/_/ma yengs byang chub sems su gsal/_/rang 'byung 'bras bu mthar phyin pa/_/'gro don mdzad
[\[354b.5\]]la rtog pa grol/_/'od gsal dbyer med gcig gi ngang /_/byang chub sems kyi rang rig 'di/_/bag chags 'khrul pa'i dbang gis na/_/brtags pas sna tshogs med bzhin grub/_/sems kyi bag chags phyir snang yang /_/rig pa 'od gsal 'gyur ba med/_/sna tshogs snang
[\[354b.6\]]ba'i rang bzhin 'di/_/snying po gsung gis brjod bya ste/_/'khrul pa ma yin log snang bas/_/rang rig byang chub sems su brjod/_/rtog pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems/_/rang rig sems la rtog par 'khrul/_/thog ma med dus bag chags dang /_/rin chen gdams ngag rkyen med pas/_/rtog
[\[354b.7\]]med snying po sems ma goms/_/thag pa sbrul min snang ba bzhin/_/lus ngag sems dbyen sgyu ma'i lus/_/sna tshogs snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di/_/chos nyid yin par dbyer med pas/_/zung du 'jug pa gang dgongs pa/_/gsal ba'i sems de nyid la ni/_/chos nyid ma yin bag mi
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]snang /_/thams cad snang ba'i ngo bo 'di/_/ye shes snying po nyid du mthong /_/ngo bo nyid la brjod pa bral/_/rang bzhin rnam dag rig pa la/_/brjod med don du ma brjod na/_/rig pa'i don la mjal ba med/_/brjod pa'i sbra la sems drangs pas/_/ma bcos rang 'byung chos
[\[355a.2\]]nyid mthong /_/rang rig sems la don rtogs nas/_/'jug thabs mi gnyis tshul gyis gnas/_/cig car rdzogs pa bde ba che/_/phyogs su ma lhung gzung ba'i sems/_/rdzogs pa'i ye shes snying po la/_/rim pa'i lam med mthar phyin nas/_/rang 'byung rtogs pa'i 'jug pa la/_/
[\[355a.3\]]de nyid snying po don ldan pas/_/'dod pa'i tshogs la yid mi 'jug_/de bzhin pha rol phyin pa drug_/rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i sems la gnas/_/bsam bral mi rtog dgongs pa la/_/de nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan/_/mi rtog 'dzin med tshul la gnas/_/ma yengs rig pa rgyun mi 'chad/_/
[\[355a.4\]]dmigs med shes pa pha rol phyin/_/sems nyid stong pa'i dngos med la/_/chos dang chos can mi gnas pas/_/dbyer med bden pa bzhi po don/_/dngos po ye shes 'gags ma yin/_/bden brdzun nyid kyi mthar mi 'dzin/_/snying po'i don la 'dod pa bral/_/kun bzang ye shes
[\[355a.5\]]'od gsal la/_/bsam bral ye shes nam mkha' 'dra/_/rdzogs pa ye shes ma bcos pa/_/mi 'gyur chos nyid dbyings kyi thugs/_/mi 'gag ye shes rig pa'i gsung /_/dbyer med chos sku gzung 'dzin bral/_/sku gsung thugs bral sku gsung thugs/_/phyi nang mi mnga'
[\[355a.6\]]rang gsal nyid/_/'byung 'jug mi mnga' rang bzhin gnas/_/dbang po ngo la snang ba'i rnams/_/chos nyid byang chub sems su mthong /_/nyon mongs lnga po ye shes lam/_/thams cad byang chub sems kyi gzhi/_/sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/_/dag pa'i sems la brtsal
[\[355a.7\]]med de/_/brtsal ba'i kun rdzob grub ma yin/_/dam pa'i don la gang 'jug pas/_/gsang ba rdzogs pa'i don nyid la/_/chos nyid gsang ba 'di dmigs na/_/nges pa'i gdams ngag zab mo yis/_/brtsal med rang gzhag brtsal ba dang /_/mi bsgom rang lugs bsgom pa
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]dang /_/mi gnas tshul la 'dug pa dang /_/gzhag med mnyam gzhag rang 'byung ba de/_/mi rtog don la gyi na ba/_/dge mi dge yi rnam rtog bral/_/byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid do/_/rang 'byung byang chub brtsal ba min/_/byang chub 'dod la byang chub sems/_/yang dag don gyi snying po
[\[355b.2\]]'di/_/btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/zhen sems nyid la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/nyal ba'i bsam gtan 'khor lo bde/_/ma lus byang chub sems kyi dang /_/chos nyid byang chub mnyam gzhag na/_/dngos med byang chub rang 'byung dang /_/'dus ma byas pas bde ba'i klong /_/

[\[365b.1\]]gsum las byung ba'i 'bras bu mngon par brjod pa'o/_/yong ye gang zhig 'jig rten las ma chags pa des 'di 'grub ste/_slob dpon 'phags pa lhas kyang tha na rgyal srid kyi bde ba la yang mi chags par bya zhes bshad la/_dpal shAkya thub pa mngon par bskul ba las kyang /_gang

[\[366a.1\]]ltar 'di kun mi rtag bdag med de/_/skyabs med mgon med gnas med de slad du/_/'khor ba chu shing snying po med pa la/_/mi mchog khyod kyi thugs ni 'byung bar mdzod/_/ces bshad do/_/gang dbang thob pa yang ste/_gsang ba'i mdzod las gsungs pa/_dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan
